mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sexual invitation ("DTF" = 'down to fuck'), with affirmative response. Other comments. Doodle of bunny with label. Cyrillic script. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
DTF? | yee | society wuz here | TAKE OFF YOUR PANTS AND TELL ME THAT YOU WAHOO | Bunny!
